D

drawNotes(int, double, int) - Static method in class pttdrawonly
This method is used to draw the actual notes of the sheet music

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class pttdrawonly
This is the main method which makes use of the drawNotes() and note() methods as well as StdAudio This uses the drawNotes() and note() methods as well as StdAudio
map(double, double, double, double, double) - Static method in class pttdrawonly
This method is used to map decimal numbers of a certain range to a new range

N

note(int, double) - Static method in class pttdrawonly
This method is used to create a note with harmonics of the given pitch, where 0 = concert A

P

pttdrawonly - Class in <Unnamed>
Create Random Music!

S

sum(double[], double[], double, double) - Static method in class pttdrawonly
This method takes the weighted average of the sum of two arrays

T

tone(double, double) - Static method in class pttdrawonly
This method is used to create a pure tone of the given frequency for the given duration

V

This method is used to change the volume of the notes
